attributes.action: Re introduce beat and rural policing to the 1950s standard..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country desperately needs to turn the clock back to 1950s and reintroduce the foot beat policeman, and the rural bobby who lived on his patch. The police have totally lost touch with the public they are supposed to protect, and the public has lost all respect for the police. Of course we need all the modern technological gismos, but most of all we need bobbys on the beat, in all areas, on foot, 24/7.
